results.title: The effect of acute simvastatin administration on the severity of arrhythmias resulting from ischaemia and reperfusion in the canine: Is there a role for nitric oxide?
results.text_hl: This latter was administered (5mg/kg, ic.) either alone (n=12) or 10min before the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Kisvári G, Kovács M, Gardi J, Seprényi G, Kaszaki J, Végh Á. The effect of acute simvastatin administration on the severity of arrhythmias resulting from ischaemia and reperfusion in the canine: Is there a role for nitric oxide? Eur J Pharmacol. 2014 Jun 5;732():96-104. PMID: 24685640

results.title: Simvastatin alleviates myocardial contractile dysfunction and lethal ischemic injury in rat heart independent of cholesterol-lowering effects.
results.text_hl: Likewise, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ shortened the duration of @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@ventricular tachycardia@@@ (10.2+/-8.1 s and 57.8+/-29.3 s in C and D-H vs. 143.6+/-28.6 s and 159.3+/-44.3 s in untreated C and D-H, respectively, both P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Adameova A, Harcarova A, Matejikova J, Pancza D, Kuzelova M, Carnicka S, Svec P, Bartekova M, Styk J, Ravingerova T. Simvastatin alleviates myocardial contractile dysfunction and lethal ischemic injury in rat heart independent of cholesterol-lowering effects. Physiol Res. 2009;58(3):449-454. PMID: 19627175
